video_prompt: A chibi garlic character, currently smiling with one hand raised, slowly blushes. Its hair-like greens subtly sway. Hands gently lower. The base of its dress transitions color.
image_prompt: Chibi anime character resembling a garlic bulb, with green plant hair, white spiky hair, yellow 5-petal flower, sparkling green eyes, pink blush, cheerful open-mouthed smile, green garlic bulb-shaped dress with bow, green cuffs, root-like footwear, full body studio shot on white background, looking at viewer, playful and innocent.
refined_video_prompt: The chibi garlic character's cheeks slowly blush. Its hair-like greens subtly sway. A raised hand gently lowers, soon joined by the other. Concurrently, the base of its dress transitions color.
